pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["以 leiningen 为例，在项目根目录的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"project.clj"}]," 中自己添加关键字 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":":mirrors"}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"然后以如下 map 格式添加源："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":":mirrors {"clojars" {:name "mirror"
                     :url "{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/"}}","codeLanguage":"clojure"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"极简示例","children":"极简示例"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"(defproject myapp "1.0.0"
   :description "My Application"
   :dependencies [[enlive "1.0.1"]
                  [cheshire "4.0.0"]
                  [org.markdownj/markdownj "0.3.0-1.0.2b4"]]
   :mirrors {"clojars" {:name "mirror"
                        :url "{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/"}}
   :main leiningen.web)","codeLanguage":"clojure"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["配置好后，在项目的根目录下运行 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"lein run"}],"，从输出中可以看到一些包是从镜像站下载的。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"注意事项","children":"注意事项"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"此镜像源替换的只是 clojars 这个仓库，一些 maven 的包依然会从 central maven 仓库下载。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["上述方法只针对单个项目生效。如果要针对所有项目进行全局配置，需修改 leiningen 的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"profiles"}]," 。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["在 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"~/.lein/projfiles.clj"}]," 中添加："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":":user {:repositories [["clojars" {:url "{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/"}]]
       ;; other :user profile settings...
       }","codeLanguage":"clojure"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["leiningen 会提示说 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":":repositories"}]," 写在了 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":":user"}]," 中，不过不影响使用。"]}]]}]

meta.title: Clojars 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
